This chunk provides an overview of advanced operations with Panda3D's internal structures, detailing vertex representation and renderable geometry, as well as instructions for manipulating this data. It serves as a guide for advanced users seeking deeper control over model rendering and animation beyond standard practices.

Advanced operations with internal structures

The following pages provide descriptions of Panda's internal representation of vertices and the renderable geometry that uses them, as well as instructions for directly reading or manipulating this data.

This is an advanced topic of Panda3D and is not necessary for ordinary model rendering and animation, but the advanced user may find this information useful.
